title: 1.12版本如何使用命令方块将物品平放在地面。
author: yejinyang

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/summon armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ 
{
Invisible:1b,
Invulnerable:1b,
PersistenceRequired:1b,
NoGravity:1b,
ShowArms:1b,
Marker:0b,
ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"dirt",Count:1b}],
HandItems:[{id:"apple",Count:1b},{id:"diamond",Count:1b}],
Pose:{LeftArm:[270f,0f,0f],RightArm:[270f,0f,0f]}
}复制代码

上面哥们指令在1.12一定不可以....因为不认0:  1:这些了
如果你不想让玩家拿走物品的话Marker设为1b

我调了无重力,你自己可以用/tp把盔甲架移动到地平面(毕竟不是所有装饰都只放在地上,比如墙上)

盔甲架生成器 看我签名档 AS...

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content: 使用盔甲架拿着物品然后修改Pose

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
/summon ArmorStand ~ ~0.7 ~ {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:物品名"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}
详见贰逼的教程贴

replies.author: yejinyang
replies.txt_content:
Sakura_End 发表于 2017-8-16 09:49
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-339021-1-1.html 这个不适用吗
你那个用不了。

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
天狼星black 发表于 2017-8-16 10:02
1.12的话
/summon armor_stand ~ ~0.7 ~ {HandItems:[0:{id:"物品名",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{}},1:{}],Po ...
请注意：
物品名替换成minecraft:物品名
比如id:"minecraft:stone"

replies.author: yejinyang
replies.txt_content:
天狼星black 发表于 2017-8-16 10:04
请注意：
物品名替换成minecraft:物品名
比如id:"minecraft:stone"
你这个用不了，在命令方块里输入你这个指令，命令方块显示数据标签解析失败。

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
yejinyang 发表于 2017-8-16 10:24
你这个用不了，在命令方块里输入你这个指令，命令方块显示数据标签解析失败。 ...
我试过可以的啊


你试试重新复制，你是不是漏掉了后面的大括号？
或者你把你输入的指令给我看
